description: This API is used to store and read data on EYWA hosted database. Usually this includes sync, stack, slice, search, get, delete, purge operations on modeled and deployed Datasets.
name: EYWA GraphQL

scopes.name: dataset:deploy
scopes.description: Allows user to deploy dataset models

scopes.name: dataset:delete
scopes.description: Allows user to delete dataset, and all tables that are specific only to that dataset

scopes.name: dataset:subscription
scopes.description: User can subscribe to dataset changes by using GraphQL "refreshedGlobalDataset" subscription endpoint
